Home » 39P4 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4) » 2 Kusalattika, Hetugocchaka » 2.3 Kusalattika, Hetusampayuttaduka » 2.3.1 Hetusampayuttapada » 2.3.1.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayacatukka
Hetu-ārammaṇa
Kusalattika, Hetugocchaka
Kusalattika, Hetusampayuttaduka
Hetusampayuttapada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetu-ārammaṇa
12.
972Kusalo hetusampayutto dhammo kusalassa hetusampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
973Akusalo hetusampayutto dhammo akusalassa hetusampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
974Abyākato hetusampayutto dhammo abyākatassa hetusampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
975Kusalo hetusampayutto dhammo kusalassa hetusampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
976Akusalo hetusampayutto dhammo akusalassa hetusampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
977Abyākato hetusampayutto dhammo abyākatassa hetusampayuttassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
13.
978Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā satta, anantare pañca, samanantare pañca, sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, āsevane tīṇi, kamme pañca, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre…pe…  sampayutte tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
979Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
980Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
981Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
982(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
